resources.string: Now, Your safekeepers are just a "Click-Away"
Warning : This is a Demo App
Tap here to read Privacy Policy

On the next Screen, Provide Following Permissions as for mentioned reasons: 
 1. Contacts : To enable selection of Emergency Contacts and getting their Names and Phone Numbers to send SMS when needed.
 2. SMS : To enable to send SMS without opening SMS Application.
 3. Location : To share your location in SMS and also present Hospitals, Chemists and Blood Banks near you.
 4. Phone : To access Mobile Network and WiFi based location, this helps in getting GPS results faster.
 5. Audio : To enable you to record your own Emergency Message.
 6. Storage : To store your recorded message on the device.
Please enter the following information about yourself:
I am in Emergency, Please Help me. My last location was :
These permissions are necessary for app to function!
Change recorded voice and Emergency Contacts
Reporting would have prevented future issues(whenever possible).
Thanks, I will be looking into this matter.
